title: Everyday Carry (EDC) | Anton Ebsen
description: The tools and gear I carry with me every day to stay productive and organized.

hero.title: Everyday Carry & Setup
hero.text: A visual walkthrough of the items I carry and use in my daily engine room. From hardware to personal essentials.

items.title: MacBook Pro / ThinkPad
items.desc: My primary computer for coding and econometrics. I value battery life and a screen that doesn't strain the eyes.

items.title: Keychron K2 (V3)
items.desc: Mechanical keyboard with brown switches. Provides the right feel for writing long reports.

items.title: Bellroy Tech Kit
items.desc: Organizing cables, dongles, and chargers. An indispensable companion to avoid clutter in the bag.

items.title: Leuchtturm1917 Notebook
items.desc: Where raw ideas start. I use the Bullet Journal method to plan my days and projects.

items.title: Lamy 2000 Fountain Pen
items.desc: A classic design icon. Writing with a good pen makes the process of thinking on paper more satisfying.

items.title: Traveler's Notebook
items.desc: Used for quick notes and as my travel journal when I'm on the go.
